description: API latency and throughput are unusually high at 144.04354119300842 ms/units, which could indicate a bottleneck or inefficiency in the system.
recommendation: Investigate the cause of high API latency and throughput. Check for network issues, inefficient code, or resource contention. Consider optimizing the API endpoints or scaling resources if necessary.

description: CPU and memory usage are within acceptable ranges but should be monitored to ensure they do not increase unexpectedly.
recommendation: Continue monitoring CPU and memory usage to ensure they remain stable. Set up alerts for significant deviations from current levels.

description: All agents have identical activity levels, which may not be typical depending on their roles and expected workloads.
